Reviews.Title: pleased with purchase
Reviews.Author: omar jose pirela sangronis
Reviews.Content: the purchased item works great I have no criticism can buy without any doubt one hundred percent reliable, , I recommend

Reviews.Title: Used 3GS for $200?
Reviews.Author: Dobrin'a
Reviews.Content: This item was advertised as "New" & "Unlocked"...Well, it was unlocked all right, but definitely not new.I realize, that in order to get a device unlocked, it is necessary to open a box and enter a code...but that shouldn't have put stains and scratches all over the unit. I wouldn't mind to pay $200 for a new "unlocked" phone but not for used one.

Reviews.Title: i like it..this item is great!
Reviews.Author: hmd
Reviews.Content: 3gs 16gb iphone is good, it's  great,,,I can used this everywhere I go in txting and in calling.. cheap and intresting

Reviews.Title: it works well.
Reviews.Author: andrea lee
Reviews.Content: My mom is very pleased with her IPhone 3GS. If she's happy i am happy. It works great. thanks. o

Reviews.Title: Fast Shipping.  Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Jassim Al-Khazraji
Reviews.Content: I am a very happy customer. I recieved this item as described and fully functional and worth my hard erned money. I would do business with this seller again.

Reviews.Title: Worst Deal I had ever
Reviews.Author: Saroj
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my sister who lives abroad. I paid that much hoping it was a new one. However, after the use of a week, the phone stopped working. Whatever she tried, the phone never worked back again. Then, I had to asked her to ship the phone back to me. When I got the phone, I took it to Apple store. The guy from Apple run some test and he said "This phone is FRANKENSTEINED...Most of its part are not genuine Apple product." Now, I can't even return the phone back since it passed a month already for taking the back and forth from abroad. It's still with me, somewhere. Can't even trash for I spend alomost 200...and cant be gift somebody that cr*p.

Reviews.Title: She loved this gift
Reviews.Author: Althea Gibson
Reviews.Content: This is item is great. She enjoyed it and couldn't stop touch probing etc..  it has served it's purpose we'll. Thank youAlthea

Reviews.Title: Apple Iphone
Reviews.Author: Denay Dwyer
Reviews.Content: The phone was as described and it is a very satisfactory purchase. There customer service was excellent as when because I spoke to them prior to doing the purchase.

Reviews.Title: can not take a child
Reviews.Author: Marcia Hundley
Reviews.Content: dropped it one time and now only the top half responds to the touch. With a cover and screen shield.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Ray R. Romero
Reviews.Content: Nice iPhone but it does not look like the original.I ordered 3, one fell off the floor, the glass cover broke and would not function anymore. So it is a waste. Our fault of course and not sure if there is any recourse.Any solution?Thanks,Ray R. Romero, MD

Reviews.Title: Not a good phone
Reviews.Author: jennifer stacey
Reviews.Content: The charger didn't work, the battery would not hold a charge, and its ability to pick up wifi was minimal at best. not happy.

Reviews.Title: I am in love with my Iphone!
Reviews.Author: M.J.
Reviews.Content: I wish this is the only smart phone I had ever had.  It works great, is very user friendly, and a perfect size.  The vendor delivered it promptly and even put it in a plastic case with a screen protector.  It was unlocked and I just had to put my new TMobile sim card in it to have service.  I watched a YouTube instructional video this 12-year-old kid made at home showing me how to upload my contacts.  I found that to be funny--if you want to know how to do something technical, just watch a kid's video or ask a kid.  At any rate, I highly recommend this vendor and am very, very happy with my phone.

Reviews.Title: Very angry customer
Reviews.Author: shannon cochran
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone because it said it was an iphone 3gs when I got it. Its an iphone 3g. I cant get it to send picture text or anything. I paid more for this phone and im very upset if I dont get a refund or an iphone 3gs replacement. I will never deal with this person or amazon period. I cant believe this is so messed up.

Reviews.Title: amgliv33@hotmail.com
Reviews.Author: Amgliv Ramirez Perez
Reviews.Content: It is nood a good phone, why? because his system dont permit download application, for example whatsapp or blackberry messenger, or angry bird or any good program only old application, because is OS cannot be upgrade, iphone only pemits that in new models, like 3gs or iphone 5.

Reviews.Title: iPhone 3GS 16G
Reviews.Author: Leo&letty;
Reviews.Content: Great job very happy with the product . Everything was in good conditions. I recommend this product for other buyers better than spending on a new phone.

Reviews.Title: The publication says "unlocked" it was not, although 10% of the cost back, remains a hoax, did not want to spend on release ...!
Reviews.Author: king
Reviews.Content: The publication says "unlocked" it was not, although 10% of the cost back, remains a hoax, did not want to spend on release ...!

Reviews.Title: pudo ser mejor...!!
Reviews.Author: Roger
Reviews.Content: la publicacion dice "desbloqueado" no fue asi, aunque regresaron 10% del costo, sigue siendo un engaño, no queria tener que gastar en liberarlo...!!
